content.prompt:
Listen to the excerpt.


Which of the following statements best describes the passage played?

choices.label: The passage is one continuous section.
The passage includes the end of one section and the start of another.
The passage consists of three sections, each in different keys.
The passage moves from triple meter to quadruple meter.

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in performed music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
